author: Zack Budryk
title: 38 percent of Arkansas COVID-19 cases concentrated in state prison
description: Thirty-eight percent of Arkansas' coronavirus cases are concentrated in a maximum-security prison, Gov. Asa Hutchinson (R) said in a Tuesday briefing.Hutchinson said that the state's total cases stand at 2,227, whi...
content:
Thirty-eight percent of Arkansas coronavirus cases are concentrated in a maximum-security prison, Gov. Asa Hutchinson (R) said in a Tuesday briefing.
Hutchinson said that the states total cases stand at 2,227, which includes 850 inmates at Cummins Prison who… [+1951 chars]
